page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Oakcraft Handmade furniture is a firm employing three people making furniture in{oak}and{pine.}The trade was established in 1970 and it's high quality furniture is distributed throughout{England.}The firm trains its employees in the skills of{hand {carving}and{furniture making}using{ {machinery.}For three years Mr.Keith Rowley, a member of{The Guild of {Master Craftsmen,}has been self-employed making high class handmade furniture,bar fittings, noveltyware etc.He is a teacher of his craft. A blacksmith in the block makes horse- shoes and ornamental wrought iron work. At our school the craft of Macrame is taught during after school activities.
